special_text:
Sacrifice an Army: Put X loyalty counters on this planeswalker, where X is equal to twice that Army's power. Activate only as a sorcery.
[0]: You lose 1 life and amass 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't have one, create a 0/0 black Army creature token first.)[/i]
[-14]: You control target opponent during their next turn. [i](You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)[/i]
